mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_info (member_id, member_no,openid,create_time) SELECT REPLACE(UUID(), "-", ""), (SELECT MAX(member_no) + 1 FROM member_info), "${openid}", NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.nickname, b.phone FROM member_address a, member_info b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND a.member_no = '${member_no}'

SELECT a.server_class_id , a.server_class_name, IF(b.server_class_id IS NULL ,0,1) has_server FROM server_class a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.*, b.server_class_id FROM server_member_info a, server_class b WHERE LOCATE( b.server_class_id, a.server_class_id_str ) AND a.member_no ='${member_no}')b ON a.server_class_id = b.server_class_id WHERE a.server_class_level = 1

SELECT a.*, b.server_member_desc, b.end_time, b.order_takes_type, b.server_class_id_str, b.server_member_id, b.shop_id, b.strat_time, b.in_prohi, b.lat, b.lon, b.photo_desc, b.short_desc FROM member_info a, server_member_info b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND a.member_no = '${member_no}'
SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM member_info a, shop_info b WHERE a.share_shop_id = b.shop_id AND b.shop_id = '${shop_id}'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.member_no) day_count FROM member_info a, shop_info b WHERE a.share_shop_id = b.shop_id AND DATE_FORMAT(a.share_shop_time, '%y-%m-%d ') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d') AND b.shop_id = '${shop_id}') a, (SELECT COUNT(a.member_no) month_count FROM member_info a, shop_info b WHERE a.share_shop_id = b.shop_id AND DATE_FORMAT(a.share_shop_time, '%y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m') AND b.shop_id = '${shop_id}') b, (SELECT COUNT(a.member_no) all_count FROM member_info a, shop_info b WHERE a.share_shop_id = b.shop_id AND b.shop_id = '${shop_id}') c
